name: Oneshot 3D - Demo out now!
description:
THIS IS A FAN PROJECT WITH NO RELATION TO THE ORIGINAL ONESHOT
IF YOU HAVEN'T PLAYED THE ORIGINAL YOU REALLY SHOULD
https://futurecat.itch.io/oneshot

A fan made remake of Oneshot in 3D!...

...About three years behind schedule

===HOW TO PLAY===

WASD to move around, Mouse to look, Space to interact, I to open inventory, Tab to quickly switch items, f11 to enter/exit fullscreen

Right now, the opening house is completely built save for one cutscene, and there will be more in the future!

===CREDITS===

Original Oneshot Team - Concept, location, original game

Bluebstopcat - Art, Programming, Level Design

Wintermelon - Music

Zapsplat.com - Sound Effects
